RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the United States of America Constitutio: the United States of America Constitution

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the United States of America Constitutio: Document outlining the fundamental laws and principles of the United States, including prohibitions on ex post facto laws
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ex post facto Law: law that prohibits applying a more onerous penalty than was in effect at the time of the offense
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the United States Congress: Legislative body of the United States, prohibited from enacting ex post facto laws
